alert.note: Alert for Cortland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 7:41AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cortland County through 815 AM EDT... At 741 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Cortland, or near Cortland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Virgil, Marathon, Lapeer, South Cortland, Munsons Corners, Freetown Corners, Gracie and Cortland West. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
